title: Bleed Me
description: My secrets weren’t hidden.They were lost.What took their place made me the monster in the night.She should tell someone about what I’ve done.She should scream the truth!But she doesn’t.Instead, she loves me.So, down the haunted road she followed me.*Bleed Me is book 3 in the Haunted Roads series. This is an all-new interconnecting standalone!
author: India R. Adams
